name.description: The name of the Private DNS Zone. Must be a valid domain name.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the resource group where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

number_of_record_sets.description: The current number of record sets in this Private DNS zone.

max_number_of_record_sets.description: The maximum number of record sets that can be created in this Private DNS zone.

max_number_of_virtual_network_links.description: The maximum number of virtual networks that can be linked to this Private DNS zone.

max_number_of_virtual_network_links_with.description: The maximum number of virtual networks that can be linked to this Private DNS zone with registration enabled.

create.description: Used when creating the Private DNS Zone.

update.description: Used when updating the Private DNS Zone.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Private DNS Zone.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Private DNS Zone.
